commands.name: az network private-dns record-set cname create
commands.summary: Create an empty CNAME record set.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set cname create --name
                                               --resource-group
                                               --zone-name
                                               [--metadata]
                                               [--ttl]
examples: az network private-dns record-set cname create -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set cname delete
commands.summary: Delete a CNAME record set and its associated record.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set cname delete [--ids]
                                               [--if-match]
                                               [--name]
                                               [--resource-group]
                                               [--subscription]
                                               [--yes]
                                               [--zone-name]
examples: az network private-dns record-set cname delete -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set cname list
commands.summary: List the CNAME record set in a zone.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set cname list --resource-group
                                             --zone-name
                                             [--max-items]
                                             [--next-token]
examples: az network private-dns record-set cname list -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set cname remove-record
commands.summary: Remove a CNAME record from its record set.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set cname remove-record --cname
                                                      --record-set-name
                                                      --resource-group
                                                      --zone-name
                                                      [--keep-empty-record-set]
examples:
az network private-dns record-set cname remove-record -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com \
    -n MyRecordSet -c www.contoso.com

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set cname set-record
commands.summary: Set the value of a CNAME record.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set cname set-record --cname
                                                   --record-set-name
                                                   --resource-group
                                                   --zone-name
examples:
az network private-dns record-set cname set-record -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com \
    -n MyRecordSet -c www.contoso.com

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set cname show
commands.summary: Get the details of a CNAME record set.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set cname show [--ids]
                                             [--name]
                                             [--resource-group]
                                             [--subscription]
                                             [--zone-name]
examples: az network private-dns record-set cname show -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set cname update
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set cname update [--add]
                                               [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                               [--ids]
                                               [--if-match]
                                               [--metadata]
                                               [--name]
                                               [--remove]
                                               [--resource-group]
                                               [--set]
                                               [--subscription]
                                               [--zone-name]
examples: az network private-dns record-set cname update -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet --metadata owner=WebTeam
